per_frame_1=//begin beat code
per_frame_2=volume = 0.3*(bass+mid);
per_frame_3=beatrate = equal(beatrate,0) + (1-equal(beatrate,0))*(below(volume,0.01) + (1-below(volume,0.01))*beatrate);
per_frame_4=lastbeat = lastbeat + equal(lastbeat,0)*time;
per_frame_5=meanbass_att = 0.05*(meanbass_att*19 + bass_att);
per_frame_6=peakbass_att = max(bass_att,peakbass_att);
per_frame_7=beat = above(volume,0.8)*below(peakbass_att - bass_att, 0.05*peakbass_att)*above(time - lastbeat, 0.1 + 0.5*(beatrate - 0.1));
per_frame_8=beatrate = max(if(beat,if(below(time-lastbeat,2*beatrate),0.1*(beatrate*9 + time - lastbeat),beatrate),beatrate),0.1);
per_frame_9=//Adjust responsiveness: To increase responsiveness, set the "0.96 and "0.996" on the next line to slightly lower values. Higher values decrease responsiveness.
per_frame_10=peakbass_att = beat*bass_att + (1-beat)*peakbass_att*(above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate)*0.96 + (1-above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate))*0.996);
per_frame_11=lastbeat = beat*time + (1-beat)*lastbeat;
per_frame_12=peakbass_att = max(peakbass_att,1.1*meanbass_att);
per_frame_13=//end beat code
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q8 = beat;
per_frame_16=warp = 0;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_19=tin = time;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=vol = (bass_att + treb_att + mid_att)*.333333;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=ra = 1/tic*.25;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);
per_frame_26=mid_avg = tic*(mid_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*mid);
per_frame_27=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);
per_frame_28=vav = tic*(vav*(1/tic - ra) + ra*(bass+treb+mid)*.33333);
per_frame_29=
per_frame_30=tt = tt + tic*treb;
per_frame_31=mt = mt + tic*mid;
per_frame_32=bt = bt + tic*bass;
per_frame_33=vt = vt + tic*vav;
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=q1 = tt*4;
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=st = .1;
per_frame_38=base = .05;
per_frame_39=q4 = base + treb_avg*st;
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=decay = decay - .5;
per_frame_42=//it = it + 1;
per_frame_43=sw = if(equal(frame%10,0),1-sw,sw);
per_frame_44=//invert = sw;
per_frame_45=q7 = sw;
per_frame_46=q7 = 1 - pow(vav,1)*.5;// density
per_frame_47=q2 = below(q7,.2);
per_frame_48=monitor = q7;
per_frame_49=
per_frame_50=dy = -1;
per_frame_51=
per_frame_52=modl = if(ctrllt,modl + tic*.1,modl - .5*modl);
per_frame_53=modr = if(ctrlrt,modr + tic*.1,modr - .5*modr);
per_frame_54=an = if(ctrllt,an - modl,an);
per_frame_55=an = if(ctrlrt,an + modr,an);
per_frame_56=//an = if(beat,an + int(rand(1001))*.001*6.2832,an);
per_frame_57=
per_frame_58=bod = if(beat,bod + 1,bod*.5);
per_frame_59=an = an + tic*.1 - bod;
per_frame_60=
per_frame_61=
per_frame_62=
per_frame_63=q8 = an;
per_pixel_1=ti = time*.3;
per_pixel_2=mul = 12 + x*0 + y*12;
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=mx = x - .5 + .35*(sin(ti*1.1278) + sin(ti*.7458));
per_pixel_5=my = y - .5 + .35*(sin(ti*.9454) + sin(ti*1.2378));
per_pixel_6=dx = mx*cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*mul - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_7=mx = x - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*1.3185) + sin(ti*.9105));
per_pixel_8=my = y - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*.8113) + sin(ti*1.0287));
per_pixel_9=dx = dx + mx*cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*mul - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=mx = x - .5 + .35*(sin(ti*1.3488) + sin(ti*.8552));
per_pixel_12=my = y - .5 + .35*(sin(ti*.7366) + sin(ti*1.1447));
per_pixel_13=dx = dx + mx*cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*mul - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_14=mx = x - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*1.1385) + sin(ti*.9901));
per_pixel_15=my = y - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*.7028) + sin(ti*1.3548));
per_pixel_16=dx = dx + mx*cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*mul - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_17=
per_pixel_18=mx = x - .5 + .35*(sin(ti*1.3544) + sin(ti*.8926));
per_pixel_19=my = y - .5 + .35*(sin(ti*.9021) + sin(ti*1.2468));
per_pixel_20=dx = dx + mx*cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*mul - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_21=mx = x - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*1.5416) + sin(ti*.7852));
per_pixel_22=my = y - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*.7436) + sin(ti*1.3266));
per_pixel_23=dx = dx + mx*cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*mul - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_24=
per_pixel_25=
per_pixel_26=an = 1;
per_pixel_27=
per_pixel_28=dy = sin(q8)*dx;
per_pixel_29=dx = cos(q8)*dx*.75;
per_pixel_30=
